summary: Implements a mock version of the Amazon MQ service for the Moto testing framework, defining placeholder exception types, core data models and backend operations for brokers, configurations, revisions, users and tags, and handling API requests to generate appropriate JSON responses.
business_intent: Allow developers to test and develop applications that interact with Amazon MQ without requiring access to the real AWS service, by providing a fully functional inâ€‘memory simulation of MQ resources and API behavior.
